RADIO PLACE - DETROIT 28. MICHIGAN
April 3, 1950
Novik,
Do you know anything about the show “VIE HUMAN BEINGS”,
distributed by the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters? Is it any good? Is it suitable for us?
Is it available to us?
UAW-CIO BROADCASTING CORPORATION OF MICHIGAN
■Serving UITKOIT A A II SOUTHEASTERN M I C II I G A N Static - Sree
